title: Jay Anderson | Naturopathy in Waterville
description: Jay Anderson provides chiropractic care. Dr. Jay Anderson is a Waterville Chiropractor, call us today at 419-878-8312!!
cleaned_text: Health and Wellness Dr. Arianna Anderson serves as the Director of our Health & Wellness Department. She is a Doctor of Naturopathy and Biomeridian technician. She specializes in Nutrition Response Testing, Meridian Stress Assessment, [Whole Food Nutrition](https://www.afcwellness.com/whole-food-nutrition), Herbology, Bach Flower Essences, and Homeopathy. Arianna consults with our patients to determine primary nutritional needs and personal goals. See the [The Four Pillars of Health](https://my.onlinechiro.com/four-pillars-of-health) to understand the systems we address first. What is Naturopathy? Naturopathic medicine is based on the belief that the human body has an innate healing ability. Naturopathic practitioners teach their patients to use diet, exercise, lifestyle changes and cutting edge natural therapies to strengthen the immune system. We view the patient as a complex, interrelated system (a whole person). Our goal is to craft comprehensive treatment plans that blend the best of modern medical science and traditional natural remedies to maintain approaches to maintain and restore health. In our Health and Wellness Department, we will help your body regain and restore its natural function. By finding and removing the barriers such as poor diet, unhealthy habits and nervous system interference, you can enhance your body's ability to heal itself. We each have a unique physical, mental, emotional, genetic, environmental, social, and spiritual makeup. The holistic wellness practitioner knows that all these factors affect our health. Arianna will carefully tailor a health plan specifically to your needs. Benefits of Whole Food Nutrition and Natural Remedies A properly nourished body can heal quicker and more completely. Through identifying which foods, herbs, and other natural or homeopathic remedies are most beneficial for your specific needs, you can experience better health and function. [Click here to learn more about Whole Food Nutrition.](https://www.afcwellness.com/whole-food-nutrition) One or more of the following services may be considered to more accurately define the problem and assist in your recovery: [Designed Clinical Nutrition](https://www.afcwellness.com/designed-clinical-nutrition)programs via [Nutrition Response Loss/Diet Counseling - Reams Biologic Ionization Testing for Urine and Saliva Analysis - Comprehensive Blood Lab Testing - Lymphatic Drainage Therapy (to support the purification process) - Meridian Stress Testing/Galvanic Skin Response Testing - Bio Impedance Testing (Body composition i.e., Body Fat BMI, Intra and Extra Cellular Fluids) - Food, Chemical, Metal and Immune Challenge Testing We may recommend some of these services based on your individualized needs with the goal to improve your health naturally. Your health is very complex and it takes a lot of effort and commitment to maintain balance. Our methods and procedures may be the missing piece to your health puzzle. When seen in our Health and Wellness Department you will be screened by our staff through a series of tests to identify nutritional needs. You will then be seen by Arianna Anderson to be assessed individually through methods of testing and health history. After your first consultation your health will be categorized into a level of care and a plan for care will be reported to you in great detail. You will be prescribed supplementation and advised on dietary suggestions. One of the methods of testing that we utilize are as follows: Meridian Stress Assessment/Galvanic Skin Response - This tests acupressure points on your hands and feet. The test results will help us identify any imbalances in your organs or organs systems.
